meanings.sent1: She lazed on the couch all day.
meanings.sent2: He always lazed around instead of helping with chores.
meanings.sent3: The cat lazed in the sun, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: Time lazed by as they lounged in the park.
meanings.sent5: The students lazed through the afternoon, avoiding their homework.

meanings.definition: To spend time in a relaxed or lazy way.
meanings.sent1: They lazed by the pool, soaking up the sun.
meanings.sent2: After work, she lazed in the hammock, sipping lemonade.
meanings.sent3: The dog lazed on the porch, watching the world go by.
meanings.sent4: Clouds lazed across the sky, moving slowly and peacefully.
meanings.sent5: The river lazed through the valley, meandering gently along.
